category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html: Rugged Concrete offers a medium grey base camouflaged by billows of white with a masculine energy that exudes confidence, competence and fortitude. Appealing to men and women, this Caesarstone color is well-suited for a chic, urban loft for a modern, unfinished edge. Or, it can mix with softer décor motifs to add a warm rustic charm. Rugged Concrete is a new finish from Caesarstone offering a clean, industrial look, perfect for modern spaces.
